title: Graphs to Invariance
premise: How structural discovery ideas evolved into robust, invariant prediction strategies.

steps.why_it_matters: Shows continuous optimization for DAG discovery and anchors the modern causal discovery toolkit.
Connects latent-variable modeling with causal effect estimation under hidden confounding.
Introduces invariant risk minimization, motivating stability criteria under distribution shift.
Frames invariant prediction as a practical objective for robust generalization across environments.

title: Fairness to Systems
premise: From counterfactual fairness to toolchains that operationalize causal reasoning.

steps.why_it_matters: Defines counterfactual fairness as a causal criterion for decision systems.
Demonstrates end-to-end causal workflows in a reusable library.
Provides a practical estimation pipeline relevant to applied fairness audits.
Illustrates invariant predictors as fairness-preserving mechanisms under shift.
